ValidationRule.description: Working hours must be between 7:00 AM and 8:00 PM.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Working_Hours_Start__c)), Working_Hours_Start__c < TIMEVALUE("07:00:00.000") ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Working_Hours_Start__c)), Working_Hours_Start__c > TIMEVALUE("20:00:00.000") ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Working_Hours_End__c)), Working_Hours_End__c > TIMEVALUE("20:00:00.000") ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Working_Hours_End__c)), Working_Hours_End__c < TIMEVALUE("07:00:00.000") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Working hours must be between 7:00 AM and 8:00 PM.
